tuv.seg: Caring for a child with a disability
Ag tabhairt aire do leanbh atá faoi mhíchumas
If you have a child with a disability you need to know about the various services in place to support you
Má tá leanbh agat atá faoi mhíchumas ba chóir duit a bheith ar an eolas faoi na seirbhísí áirithe atá ann chun tacú leat
Legally, a child is someone under the age of 18 years
De réir an dlí in Éirinn, is leanbh é duine atá faoi 18 mbliana d’aois
Often however, parents (or other family members) continue to care for children with disabilities long after they reach adulthood
Is minic, áfach, a leanann tuismitheoirí (nó baill eile teaghlaigh) d’aire a thabhairt do pháistí atá faoi mhíchumas i bhfad i ndiaidh dóibh aosacht a bhaint amach
Children with disabilities are entitled to the same services and family benefits as all other children
Bíonn leanaí atá faoi mhíchumas i dteideal na seirbhísí céanna agus na sochar céanna teaghlaigh agus a bhíonn leanaí eile
The emphasis in the following information is on those services and payments specifically related to disability
Tá an bhéim san eolas seo a leanas ar na seirbhísí agus na híocaíochtaí sin a bhfuil baint faoi leith acu le míchumas
They apply whether the child was born with the disability or acquired it later
Téann siad i bhfeidhm má rugadh an leanbh faoi mhíchumas nó mar tháinig sé air níos moille
GPs (family doctors) provide free developmental examinations in the weeks following birth
Soláthraíonn dochtúirí teaghlaigh scrúduithe forbartha saor in aisce sna seachtainí i ndiaidh breithe
Public health nurses monitor the development of babies in their first months and can provide information and support
Déanann altraí sláinte phoiblí monatóireacht ar fhorbairt na leanaí sna céad míonna agus is féidir leo eolas agus tacaíocht a sholáthar

Children with a disability who were born after 1 June 2002 are entitled to an assessment of need of health supports and services and to get an Assessment Report and a statement of the services they will receive

Tá leanaí faoi mhíchumas a rugadh tar éis an 1 Meitheamh 2002 i dteideal measúnú riachtanais de thacaíochtaí sláinte agus seirbhísí agus chun Tuarascáil Measúnuithe a fháil agus ráiteas ar na seirbhísí a bhfaighidh siad
Health services for children with disabilities are organised and delivered differently in different areas
Tá seirbhísí sláinte do leanaí faoi mhíchumas eagraithe agus curtha ar fáil ar bhealaí éagsúla in áiteanna difriúla
Your Local Health Office can tell you the services that are available in your area
Is féidir le d'Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil insint duit cé na seirbhísí atá ar fáil i do cheantar
Your child may be eligible for a medical card or GP visit card depending on your circumstances
Seans go mbeadh do leanbh i dteideal ar chárta leighis nó cárta cuairte LG ag brath ar do choinníollacha
The GP visit card is available to all children under the age of 6, without an income test
Tá do chárta cuairte LG ar fáil do gach leanbh faoi aois 6, gan aon tástáil ioncaim
People who have certain conditions that are covered by the Long Term Illness Scheme can get free medicines and appliances for those conditions
Is féidir le daoine a bhfuil coinníollacha áirithe acu a bhfuil clúdaithe ag Scéim Tinneas Fadtéarmach cóir leighis agus fearais do na coinníollacha a fháil saor in aisce

There are charges for public hospitals but some people are exempt, including medical card holders, children up to six weeks of age, children who have certain diseases and disabilities, and children referred from child health clinics or school health checks

Tá táillí ann d'ospidéil phoiblí ach tá díolúine ag roinnt daoine, coinnitheoirí cárta leighis, leanaí suas go sé seachtaine d'aois, leanaí a bhfuil galair nó míchumas áirithe acu, agus leanaí a seoltar ó chlinicí sláinte leanaí nó seiceálacha sláinte scoile
Community care services include public health nurses, social workers, occupational therapists, home help services, chiropody services, speech and language therapy services, respite care and day care

Is éard atá i gceist le seirbhísí cúram pobail ná altraí sláinte poiblí, oibrithe sóisialta, teiripeoirí sláinte, cúntóirí baile, seirbhísí cosliachta, seirbhísí teiripe urlabhra agus teanga, cúram faoisimh agus cúram lae
The Health Information and Quality Authority (HIQA) is responsible for the regulation of residential services for children and adults with disabilities
Tá an tÚdarás um Cháilíocht agus Eolas Sláinte freagrach as rialachán ar sheirbhísí cónaitheacha do leanaí agus d'aosaigh faoi mhííchumas
Children with a disability who were born after 1 June 2002 are entitled to an assessment of need of education supports and services
Tá leanaí faoi mhíchumas a rugadh tar éis an 1 Meitheamh 2002 i dteideal ar mheasúnú riachtanais de thacaíochtaí agus seirbhísí oideachais
The Early Childhood Care and Education Scheme (ECCE) provides free early childhood care and education for children of pre-school age
Soláthraíonn an Scéim Cúraim agus Oideachais Luath-Óige cúram luath-óige saor in aisce agus oideachas do leanaí ar aois réamhscoile iad
The Access and Inclusion Model (AIM) provides supports to help children with a disability access the ECCE
Solááthraíonn an Múnla um Rochtain agus Chuimsiú tacaíochtaí chun cuidiú le leanaí faoi mhíchumas rochtain a fháil ar an Scéim Cúraim agus Oideachais Luath-Óige
Special needs education provides supports to help children with disabilities in primary education and post-primary education
Soláthraíonn Oideachas Riachtanas Speisialta tacaíochtaí chun cuidiú le leanaí faoi mhíchumas sa bhunoideachas agus san oideachas iarbhunscoile
Many areas have school transport for children with special needs
Tá iompar scoile do ghasúir le riachtanais speisialta i go leor ceantracha
There are also supports for third-level students with a disability
Tá tacaíochtaí ann freisin do mhic-léinn tríú leibhéil faoi mhíchumas
Providing for a child with a disability
Ag soláthar do leanbh faoi mhíchumas
Although a child with a disability may be maintained by their parents after the age of 18 this does not provide them with any special entitlement to provision in a parent’s will

Cé gur féidir le tuismitheoirí leanbh faoi mhíchumas a chothabháil i ndiaidh dóibh a bheith 18 bliana d'aois, ní sholáthraíonn seo iad le haon teidlíocht speisialta d'aon soláthar in uacht tuismitheora
If you want to make specific provision for your child, you should get legal advice
Más mian leat aon soláthar speisialta a dhéanamh do do leanbh, ba cheart duit comhairle dleathach a lorg
One option is a trust from which your child may benefit after your death
Rogha amháin is ea iontaobhas as ar féidir le do leanbh leasa a bhaint as i ndiaidh duit bás a fháil
Many parents use discretionary trusts to provide for a child with a disability without affecting entitlement to benefits
Úsáideann go leor tuismitheoirí iontaobhais lánroghnacha chun soláthar do leanbh faoi mhíchumas gan cur isteach ar theidlíochtaí agus sochair
You may use a covenant as a tax-efficient way to give money to a child aged over 18, but this could affect the child’s entitlement to Disability Allowance

Is féidir cúnant a úsáid mar bhealach cáinéifeachtúil chun airgead a thabhairt do leanbh ar aois 18 é/í nó níos mó, ach seans go bhféadfadh seo cur isteach ar theidlíocht linbh ar an Liúntas Míchumais

Most public sector occupational pension schemes, and some private sector schemes, have provisions that allow for the pension arrangements for dependent children to continue for the lifetime of a permanently incapacitated child

Tá soláthair ag an gcuid is mó de scéimeanna pinsin gairme, agus ag roinnt scéimeanna de chuid na hearnála poiblí a cheadaíonn do shocrúcháin pinsin leanacht ar aghaidh do ghasúir cleithiúnacha do shaol iomlán leanbh ar éagumas
You may qualify for supports for carers
Is féidir cáiliú do thacaíocht do chúramóirí
There is a range of social welfare payments for people who have a disability
Tá réimse íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
These include Disability Allowance which your child may be entitled to when they reach the age of 16
Ina measc tá Liúntas Míchumais a bhfuil seans ann go bhfuil do ghasúr i dteideal air nuair a shroicheann sé/sí 16 bliain d'aois
If your child takes up employment, it may affect their Disability Allowance
Má thugann do leanbh faoi fhostaíocht, seans go mbeidh éifeacht aige ar a Liúntas Míchumais
For more information about this, see Disability payments and work
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil, féach Íocaíochtaí míchumais agus obair
People with disabilities may access rehabilitative training for core life skills or vocational training for work-related skills
Is féidir le daoine faoi mhíchumas rochtain a fháil ar thraenáil athshlánúcháin do scoileanna saoil lárnacha nó traenáil ghairme do scileanna a bhaineann le hobair
Read more about rehabilitation and training services for people with disabilities
Léigh a thuilleadh faoi sheirbhísí athshlánúcháin agus traenála do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas
Employment supports aim to help people with a disability gain and retain employment
Tá sé de chuspóir ag tacaíochtaí fostaíochta cúnamh a thabhairt do dhaoine faoi mhíchumas chun fostaíocht a fháil agus a choinneáil
Under the Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Scheme, tax reliefs are available for the costs of buying and using a vehicle
Faoin scéim Tiománaithe faoi mhíchumas agus Paisinéirí faoi mhíchumas, tá faoiseamh cánach ar fáil do chostais feithicil a cheannach agus a úsáid
If you need to adapt your house for your child's needs you may qualify for the Housing Adaptation Grant
Más gá do theach a oiriúnú do riachtanais do linbh, seans go bhfuil tú incháilithe don Deontas Oiriúnaithe Tithe
If your child is getting Disability Allowance, but is not capable of managing money, you may be the agent appointed by the Department of Social Protection to deal with the money
Má tá do leanbh ag fáil Liúntas Míchumais, ach nach bhfuil ábalta airgead a bhainistiú, seans go mbeidh i do ghníomhaire ceaptha ag an Roinn Coimirce Sósialaí chun déileáil leis an airgead
The money belongs to your child and you must use it for their benefit
Is le do leanbh an t-airgead agus ba cheart é a úsáid ar mhaith leo siúd
If your child has substantial money or assets, they may be made a Ward of Court
Má tá a dhóthain airgid nó acmhainní ag do pháiste, is féidir Coimirciú Cúirte a dhéanamh dóibh
Planning for the future
Ag pleanáil le haghaidh an todhchaí
Most parents of people with disabilities want to try to ensure that their children will be adequately cared for after their own deaths
Is mian leis an gcuid is mó de thuismitheoirí daoine atá faoi mhíchumas cinnte a dhéanamh de go dtabharfar aire chuí dá gcuid leanaí i ndiaidh dóibh féin bás a fháil

You should get legal advice if you want to make special provisions for a child with a disability in your will and also ensure that they retain entitlement to benefits such as the Disability Allowance and medical card

Ba chóir duit comhairle dlí a fháil dá mba mhaith leat forálacha speisialta a dhéanamh i do thiomna le haghaidh linbh atá faoi mhíchumas agus cinnte a dhéanamh de go mbíonn siad i dteideal sochar ar nós Liúntas Míchumais agus cárta leighis go fóill
You may appoint a guardian in your will
Tá cead agat caomhnóir a ainmniú i do thiomna
This however only applies if your child is under 18 when it comes into effect
Ní théann sé seo i bhfeidhm, áfach, ach amháin má bhíonn do leanbh faoi 18 mbliana d’aois nuair a fhaigheann tú bás
It is not possible to appoint a guardian for an adult child
Níl féidir caomhnóir a ainmniú le haghaidh leanbh fásta
